Text: Welcome to My Bank of AmericaWelcome Thank you for choosing My Bank of America the free service that lets you manage all your online accounts in one place with one Passcode To fully enjoy the convenience and control that My Bank of America provides we encourage you to add all your online accounts ADDING ACCOUNTS IS EASY When you registered for My Bank of America your Bank of America accounts were automatically added for you To add more accounts simply find the company and account on our Add an Account page and enter the user ID and password that you use to access that accounts Web site Thats it Youll never have to remember or enter multiple passwords again ITS MORE THAN JUST YOUR FINANCIAL ACCOUNTS You can add your banking investment credit card and k accounts from hundreds of different institutions but theres much more You can also add your travel rewards and reservation accounts so that you never miss a flight And by adding your email accounts like Hotmail or Yahoo Mail you will be able to see all your messages from all your accounts on one page Why not add your online shopping auctions news and more ENJOY THE MANY FEATURES OF MY BANK OF AMERICA Along with consolidating your online accounts on My Bank of America personalized stock quotes research and market data and financial planning tools are just a mouse click away ITS SECURE AND PRIVATE Concerned about account security Your information will be protected by one of the most trusted names in the financial services industry For more details refer to our Privacy Policy at wwwbankofamericacomprivacy We value your business and hope you enjoy My Bank of America To learn more or to begin using My Bank of America right away go directly to wwwbankofamericacommybankofamerica If you have questions or comments about this service please sign in to My Bank of America and contact our Customer Care staff using Secure Online Mail which is reached via the Contact Us button at the top of the page Representatives are available seven days a week from am until pm Sincerely Erik L Fine Senior Vice President Bank of America Refers to all accounts linked to your ID and Passcode for Online Banking with Bank of America
